title: A model of purging dynamics
pseudocode:
## Definitions
q0 = 0.1
s = 0.3
h = 0
N = 100
L = 100
rep = 100

## Average fitness per locus
w = q**2 + 2*q*(1-q)*(1-h*s) + (1-q)**2

## Change in allele frequency per locus
q_det(t+1,l) = (q**2 + q*(1-q)*(1-h*s))/w

## Genetic drift per locus
q(t+1,l)=(binomial(2N, q_det(t+1,l)))*1/2N

input_params.label: Steps
input_params.name: target_steps
input_params.description: Number of generations to run the model for

input_params.label: q_0
input_params.name: q0
input_params.description: Initial frequency of the allele at each locus

input_params.label: s
input_params.name: s
input_params.description: Relative fitness cost of the allele

input_params.label: h
input_params.name: h
input_params.description: Dominance of the allele over the wild type allele
